README.txt

The coded answer is in import.pl and the output file is clusters.txt :

Initially, there were 25 clusters. After merging, only 21 clusters are left.
Cluster IDs 74000003,75000001,84000001,85000006 sont supprim√©s.

Cluster IDs before merging:

[65000001,65000002,65000003,65000004,74000001,74000002,74000003,
75000001,75000002,76000001,76000002,76000004,76000003,84000001,
84000003,84000002,84000004,85000004,85000001,85000002,85000003,
85000007,85000005,85000006,86000001]

Cluster IDs after merging:
